name: whatsapp-listener
description: WhatsApp group listener for Mazunte Connect - captures messages and media from community groups

scripts.local:backfill: LOCAL_MODE=true USE_SESSION_FILES=true BACKFILL_ENABLED=true BACKFILL_ON_STARTUP=true node src/index.js
scripts.sessions:list: node -e "import('./src/local-storage.js').then(async m => { const files = await m.listSessionFiles(); console.log('\\n📁 Session Files:\\n'); files.forEach((f,i) => console.log(`   ${i+1}. ${f.filename} (${f.messageCount} messages) - ${f.sessionDate}`)); })"
scripts.pipeline:all: yarn pipeline:extract && yarn pipeline:process && yarn pipeline:sql
scripts.pipeline:clean: rm -rf data/extracted/* data/final/* && echo '🧹 Cleaned pipeline outputs'
scripts.db:setup: yarn migrate:up && echo '✅ Database setup complete'
scripts.db:reset: yarn migrate:down && yarn migrate:up && echo '✅ Database reset complete'
scripts.deploy: git push origin main && echo '🚀 Deploying to Render...'
scripts.logs: echo '📋 Open Render dashboard to view logs: https://dashboard.render.com'
scripts.check: yarn test:db && echo '✅ All checks passed'

author: Mazunte Connect
